nav.div: Waterford Public Schools » Our District » Superintendent » District Updates - COVID-19

span.style: font-size: large; font-family: "Didact Gothic"; color: rgb(35, 31, 32);

span.span:
To ensure the safety and well-being of our students, staff, and families, we continue to closely monitor the news about the coronavirus (COVID-19) and we stay in active communication with the Ledge Light Health District (LLHD). Current information is available through the following links:
​

Tech Support Email for Parents and Students - techsupport@waterfordschools.org
Message from the Superintendent re: School Closure Extension to May 20, 2020
Distance Learning Update - March 26, 2020
Internet Provider Information during Coronavirus (COVID-19)
Message from the Superintendent re: 2019-2020 Calendar Revision
District Update - WPS Special Services
District Update - March 20, 2020
Distance Learning Update - March 19, 2020
CIAC Spring Sports Update - March 18, 2020
​District Update to Families - March 16, 2020
WPS Meal Assistance For Families
District Closure Update - March 13, 2020 4:30 PM
District Update - March 13, 2020 - School Closure
